lines.text: Young man, are you popping pills?
I sure am. I'm a popper, she's a popper, he's a popper... wouldn't you like to be a popper too?
[Ginger pulls out a joint]
No thanks, I'm trying to quit.

[laughs]
These aren't cigarettes. They don't kill you. They let you live, baby.
It's just a little weed. Well, maybe not such a little. How 'bout, six trash bags full?
Six bags full? Like that?
Don't be mad, be glad.
I don't mean to be mean, Sarah, but just look at yourself. You don't wanna have any fun. You're a fifty-year-old teenager.
[last lines]
There'll never be another party like this one.
Is that a salami in your pocket, or you just glad to see me?

[pulling one out of his pocket]
It's a salami.
Where did all these girls come from?
I don't know. One of these studs must have called a pound.
Ginger! There's a guy and a girl in the bathroom together.
Yeah?
And they're doing it!
How do you know?
I saw them.
Well, maybe they're washing each others' backs.
Ginger, I'm not stupid.
No, but you are uptight. You'll get over it.

[flexing]
How do you like these pecks?

[unzipping her top]
How do you like these bushels?
Next fall, I start UCLA, pre-law. Then, a couple years of law school, maybe join up with a good firm for a couple of years, specialize, and...
Oh, whoa, what is that, eight, ten years there? What if you get that far and find out you don't like being a lawyer?
I don't plan to not like being a lawyer.
You're programming yourself just like a computer.
Well, what's wrong with that?
Nothing, if you happen to be a computer. You're a real, live human being.
So?
So follow your impulses once in awhile. Be human.
I admire your spirit, Captain Jack. I can say this for you, you got balls, like me.
But I don't play with mine all the time.

[hungover]
My mouth feels like an army marched through it.
Well, lock me in a freezer and call me a popsicle!
We're not gonna let the killer weed fall into the innocent hands of our American youth!
That was great!
What, the grass or us?
Oh, I don't know. Shall we try it all over again, so I can make up my mind?
What, Carl, already?
We found the marijuana, sir!
Burn ittt!
No! No! No!
I want them to see it destroyed, like it destroys their minds. You kids know what you're doing to yourselves?
Yeah!
Your body is a temple.
Oh, I know.
You should watch what you put into it.
Oh, I do!
I'm going back into politics. It's safer, more profit. Set a course for San Clemente!
